item.title: Karun Nair went six months without playing to becoming one of the top performers of the Vijay Hazare Trophy — now selectors are interested - The Indian Express
item.description:
Karun Nair went six months without playing to becoming one of the top performers of the Vijay Hazare Trophy — now selectors are interested

Publication Date: January 2025

Source: The Indian Express

Karun Nair, a notable figure in India's cricketing history, has successfully made a comeback after an extended break, emerging as a star in the ongoing Vijay Hazare Trophy.

After facing a long period without competitive play, Nair's recent performances have attracted attention from selectors as he showcases his skills and reliability.

  • Karun faced a six-month gap in competitive cricket during the 2022-2023 season.
  • He returned to form with four successive centuries in the Vijay Hazare Trophy.
  • Nair's latest score includes an unbeaten 122, helping Vidarbha reach the semi-finals.
  • His consistent performance has put him back on selectors' radar as India transitions its Test team.
  • Karun credits his return to focused training and support from his coach and team.
“For six-seven months, when I didn’t play any cricket, all I did was travel three hours a day just to have a net session.” - Karun Nair

Nair's return to form not only rejuvenates his cricketing career but also highlights the importance of perseverance and hard work in sports.

item.title: Punjab Kings Announce New Captain For IPL 2025: "We Had Identified..." - NDTV Sports
item.description:
Punjab Kings Announce New Captain For IPL 2025: "We Had Identified..."

Publication Date: November 26, 2024
Source: NDTV

The Punjab Kings have announced Shreyas Iyer as their new captain for the IPL 2025 season, a decision made public by Bollywood superstar Salman Khan on the reality show 'Bigg Boss'.

  • Shreyas Iyer expresses gratitude and aims to lead the team to its first title.
  • Head coach Ricky Ponting endorses Iyer's leadership capabilities.
  • Punjab Kings acquired Iyer for Rs 26.75 crore, making him one of the most expensive players in the auction.
  • The team aims to build a strong squad under new head coach Ricky Ponting.
“I am honoured that the team has reposed its faith in me.” - Shreyas Iyer

In conclusion, with Iyer's leadership and a well-structured squad, Punjab Kings are optimistic about their chances in the upcoming IPL season.

item.title: Shreyas Iyer appointed Punjab Kings captain for IPL 2025 - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
Shreyas Iyer appointed Punjab Kings captain for IPL 2025

Date: Sunday, October 1, 2023

Source: ESPN Cricinfo

Shreyas Iyer, the second-most expensive player in the IPL 2025 auction, has been appointed the captain of Punjab Kings. The announcement was made during an episode of Big Boss.

  • Iyer secured a contract worth INR 26.75 crore (approximately USD 3.18 million).
  • Punjab Kings were the highest bidders for Iyer at the mega auction.
  • Iyer reunites with coach Ricky Ponting, who has expressed confidence in his leadership abilities.
  • Iyer was previously the captain of Kolkata Knight Riders, leading them to an IPL title in 2024.
“I am honoured that the team has reposed its faith in me. I hope to repay the faith shown by the management to deliver our maiden title.” - Shreyas Iyer

With strong support from Ponting, Iyer aims to lead Punjab Kings to their first IPL title, leveraging his experience in the league.

item.title: FA Cup 2025: Arsenal’s players wear all-white uniform against Man United, here’s why - Mint
item.description:
FA Cup 2025: Arsenal’s Players Don All-White Uniform Against Man United to Combat Youth Violence

Publication Date: January 8, 2025 | Source: AP

In an effort to raise awareness against knife crime and youth violence, Arsenal's players wore all-white uniforms during their FA Cup match against Manchester United.

  • Arsenal's “No More Red” campaign, launched in 2022, focuses on creating safe spaces for youth.
  • The all-white uniform symbolizes the club's commitment and is not available for purchase.
  • Freddie Hudson, head of Arsenal in the Community, emphasized the importance of trust and community engagement.
  • During the match, striker Gabriel Jesus was injured and carried off the field.
“It’s important we continue to invest in safe spaces where we engage young people facing multiple challenges as they navigate their way through their lives,” - Freddie Hudson.

This initiative highlights the club's ongoing social responsibility efforts while addressing pressing societal issues.

item.title: India my favourite vs Pakistan, Jasprit Bumrah's absence will be huge loss: Mohammad Amir opens up on ICC - The Times of India
item.description:
India my favourite vs Pakistan, Jasprit Bumrah's absence will be huge loss: Mohammad Amir opens up on ICC Champions Trophy 2025

Publication Date: Not provided Source: Not provided

In a recent interview, former Pakistani cricketer Mohammad Amir highlighted the significance of Jasprit Bumrah's absence from the ICC Champions Trophy 2025, believing it will pose a substantial loss for the Indian team.

  • Mohammad Amir emphasized that Bumrah is a key player for India.
  • He noted that matches between India and Pakistan are always thrilling.
  • The ICC Champions Trophy 2025 is highly anticipated by fans from both countries.
“Bumrah’s absence is a huge loss for India, especially in a tournament like the Champions Trophy.”

Amir underlined that while India has a strong lineup, Bumrah's skills as a bowler are irreplaceable. His absence could change the dynamics of the matches.

item.title: Dhanashree Verma shares pics with mother amid divorce rumours with Yuzvendra Chahal - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Dhanashree Verma shares pictures with mother amid divorce rumors with Yuzvendra Chahal

Date: Jan 12, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Dhanashree Verma recently shared photos with her mother on Instagram amidst ongoing divorce rumors with cricketer Yuzvendra Chahal. Fans are curious whether she has returned to her family home due to marital troubles.

  • Dhanashree posted pictures on Instagram showing her with her mother.
  • Speculation arose regarding her relationship status with Yuzvendra Chahal due to the subdued expression in her photos.
  • Fans have commented on the situation, with some urging respect for their privacy.
  • Dhanashree and Yuzvendra got engaged in August 2020 and married in December of the same year.
  • Rumors of a troubled marriage began when the couple unfollowed each other on Instagram.
  • Dhanashree addressed the rumors indirectly, highlighting the negativity and trolling online.
Dhanashree: "The past few days have been incredibly tough for my family and me. What's truly upsetting is the baseless writing, devoid of fact-checking... My silence is not a sign of weakness; but of strength."

Her recent posts and the surrounding speculation continue to generate discussions among fans and followers regarding her marriage.

item.title: IPL begins March 21 weekend; WPL to start from February 7 - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
IPL begins March 21 weekend; WPL to start from February 7

Publication date: Not specified Source: Not specified

The 2025 IPL is scheduled to commence on March 21, with Eden Gardens hosting both the tournament opener and the final on May 25. The 2025 WPL will take place from February 7 to March 2.

  • The IPL will have a two-week gap before starting, following the 2025 Champions Trophy final on March 9.
  • Eden Gardens, home of the Kolkata Knight Riders, will host the opener and final.
  • The 2025 season will consist of 74 matches, same as the last three seasons.
  • The WPL will be played in Mumbai, Bangalore, Baroda, and Lucknow.
“The full IPL schedule is expected to be out later this month.”

In conclusion, the announcements for both IPL and WPL set clear timelines for fans and franchises as preparations begin.

item.title: Arsenal vs Manchester United Live Streaming FA Cup 2024-25 Live Telecast: When And Where To Watch - NDTV Sports
item.description:
Arsenal vs Manchester United Live Streaming FA Cup 2024-25 Live Telecast: When And Where To Watch

Date: January 12, 2025

Source: NDTV

Arsenal faces Manchester United in a crucial FA Cup third round match at Emirates Stadium, as both teams seek a much-needed victory.

  • The match takes place on January 12, 2025, at 8:30 PM IST.
  • It will be held at Emirates Stadium in London, England.
  • Live telecast available on Sony Sports Network.
  • Live streaming on the Sony LIV app and website.
  • Arsenal aims for cup success amid a poor league run, while United hopes to break a five-game winless streak.
“The only silverware of Arteta's Arsenal reign came with a record 14th FA Cup triumph in 2020.”

This encounter is significant as it showcases the historic rivalry between two of the FA Cup's most successful clubs.

item.title: Never seen before, Yuvraj Singh father Yograj Singh hails MS Dhoni, He was fearless... - India.com
item.description:
Yograj Singh Praises MS Dhoni's Fearless Leadership

Publication Date: Date Not Specified

Source: India.com

Yograj Singh, father of cricketer Yuvraj Singh, has publicly praised MS Dhoni, noting his dynamic and fearless leadership style in a recent interview, marking a significant shift from his previous criticism.

  • Yograj Singh described Dhoni as a ‘dynamic’ and ‘fearless’ leader during a tribute.
  • He highlighted Dhoni's strategic acumen, particularly in reading the game, emphasizing his guidance to bowlers.
  • Yograj reflected on Dhoni’s impact on Indian cricket, notably during the 2007 T20 World Cup and 2011 ODI World Cup victories.
  • Dhoni's decision-making skills were exemplified by his promotion of Rohit Sharma during the 2013 Champions Trophy, which revolutionized Indian batting.
  • Yograj speculated that Yuvraj's career might have lasted longer without Dhoni's influence.
"MS Dhoni is the sixth-highest run-scorer in ODIs, with over 10,000 runs at an average of 50.23."

This praise signifies a reconciliatory gesture from Yograj, acknowledging Dhoni's pivotal role in shaping modern Indian cricket.

item.title: D Gukesh vs R Praggnanandhaa: Who is RICHER between the two chess Grandmasters, check their net worth - India.com
item.description:
D Gukesh vs R Praggnanandhaa: Who is RICHER between the two chess Grandmasters, check their net worth

Publication Date: Not Specified Source: india.com

This article explores the net worth of India's two chess Grandmasters, D Gukesh and R Praggnanandhaa, comparing their wealth to determine who is richer.

  • D Gukesh's net worth is estimated at approximately Rs 20 crore (around $2.4 million).
  • R Praggnanandhaa's net worth is about $1 million (approximately Rs 8.26 crore).
  • D Gukesh is the youngest player to claim the title of World Chess Champion.
  • R Praggnanandhaa is currently ranked 12th in the global chess rankings.
D Gukesh's current net worth has increased significantly after his recent successes in the World Chess Championship.

This comparison showcases the financial achievements of two of India's youngest chess prodigies and highlights their accomplishments in the sport.

item.title: Sears and O'Rourke included in New Zealand's Champions Trophy squad - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
New Zealand Announces Champions Trophy Squad Including Sears and O'Rourke

Date: February 7, 2023 Source: ESPN Cricinfo

Fast bowlers Ben Sears and Will O'Rourke have been named in New Zealand's squad for the upcoming Champions Trophy, reflecting the team's strategy to include versatile and dynamic players.

  • Ben Sears, returning from injury, may make his ODI debut.
  • Will O'Rourke has showcased impressive skills early in his international career.
  • Nathan Smith brings added strength and utility as an allrounder.
  • Head coach Gary Stead emphasizes the importance of Sears' pace in Pakistan's conditions.
“We've been a little conservative in Ben's return to play, but we always had an eye that we thought he would be part of this Champions Trophy squad,” said Gary Stead.

Inclusion of Sears and O'Rourke means Jacob Duffy will not be part of the main squad despite his recent performances.

The final squad will play in an ODI tri-series in Pakistan before the Champions Trophy, beginning with matches against Pakistan and South Africa.

item.title: BCCI Confirms Starting Date For IPL 2025 - Everything You Need To Know - NDTV Sports
item.description:
IPL 2025 Begins on March 23, Confirms BCCI

Publication Date: Sunday

Source: Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI)

The 18th season of the Indian Premier League (IPL) will officially start on March 23, 2025, as confirmed by BCCI Vice President Rajeev Shukla. The announcement comes after all 10 franchises have chosen their squads during the mega auction held in November 2024.

  • IPL 2025 kick-off confirmed for March 23.
  • Last season started on March 22, 2024, concluding on May 26.
  • Kolkata Knight Riders are the defending champions.
  • Venues for the Women’s Premier League (WPL) will be announced soon.
  • All franchises have finalized their squads during the mega auction.
“IPL is going to start from March 23.” - Rajeev Shukla

With the excitement building up for the upcoming season, fans are eagerly looking forward to the matches and performances from their favorite teams.

item.title: Australian Open 2025: Sumit Nagal’s campaign ends in first round, Indian tennis star loses to world No. 25 Tomas Machac - Mint
item.description:
Sumit Nagal Eliminated in First Round of Australian Open 2025 by Tomas Machac

Publication Date: Sunday
Source: Live Mint

Sumit Nagal's journey at the Australian Open 2025 concluded in the first round, where he faced world No. 25 Tomas Machac and lost in straight sets.

  • Nagal lost to Machac with scores of 3-6, 1-6, 5-7.
  • Despite an early strong performance, Nagal struggled with errors and could not capitalize on his chances.
  • The match showcased Nagal's inconsistency, particularly during crucial moments.
  • This marks the end of India's singles campaign at the tournament, although Indian players continue in the doubles event.
  • Last year, Nagal made headlines by reaching the main draw and eliminating a higher-ranked opponent in the first round.
“Last year, Nagal made headlines by reaching the Australian Open main draw through the qualifiers and stunning higher-ranked Alexander Bublik in the first round before bowing out in the second.”

The early exit against Machac highlights the challenges faced by Indian players in the singles category at this year's tournament.

item.title: "Not Doing Any PR": Ex India Star Fumes Over Rishabh Pant's Omission From T20I Squad - NDTV Sports
item.description:
Not Doing Any PR: Ex India Star Fumes Over Rishabh Pant's Omission From T20I Squad

Publication Date: November 28, 2024 | Source: NDTV

Former cricketer Aakash Chopra expresses disappointment over Rishabh Pant's absence from India's T20I squad against England, highlighting the selection of younger players.

  • Rishabh Pant, Shubman Gill, and Yashasvi Jaiswal were not selected for the T20I series.
  • Aakash Chopra criticizes the preference for Dhruv Jurel over Pant as a wicket-keeper choice.
  • Chopra believes Pant is a generational talent and urges the BCCI to invest in his future.
  • He questions the clarity of selectors regarding Pant's position in the team.
“It can't be that Rishabh Pant is not in your scheme of things. So early in his career, have you taken this call?” - Aakash Chopra

Chopra calls for more transparency from selectors regarding player selections, especially during transition phases.

item.title: Fourteen-year-old Ira Jadhav smashes 346* for Mumbai U-19 in a 50-over game - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
Fourteen-year-old Ira Jadhav smashes 346* for Mumbai U-19 in a 50-over game

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 | Source: ESPN Cricinfo

Fourteen-year-old Ira Jadhav scored an unbeaten 346 off 157 balls, propelling Mumbai to 563 for 3 against Meghalaya in the Women's Under-19 One Day Trophy. Jadhav hit 42 fours and 16 sixes, showcasing an impressive strike rate of 220.38.

  • Meghalaya was bowled out for just 19 runs, resulting in a 544-run victory for Mumbai.
  • Jadhav's innings included a remarkable 274-run partnership for the second wicket with her captain Hurley Gala.
  • The previous record for the highest score in a women's U-19 match was held by South Africa's Lizelle Lee.
  • Jadhav was named among the standbys for India's Under-19 T20 World Cup squad.
“Ira Jadhav’s performance was exceptional, demonstrating her immense talent and potential in cricket.”

This remarkable feat highlights Ira Jadhav as a rising star in women's cricket, with significant achievements at such a young age.

item.title: Every ICC Men's Champions Trophy 2025 squad - ICC Cricket
item.description:
ICC Men's Champions Trophy 2025 Squads Announced

Publication Date: February 2025
Source: ICC Cricket

The ICC Champions Trophy 2025 marks the tournament's return after an eight-year hiatus, hosted by Pakistan. The competition will feature eight teams divided into two groups, each vying for the title.

Key Points:

  • The tournament begins on February 19th with Pakistan facing New Zealand.
  • Group A includes Bangladesh, India, Pakistan, and New Zealand.
  • Group B consists of Afghanistan, England, Australia, and South Africa.
  • Each team will play three matches with the top two from each group advancing to the semi-finals.

Squads:

Group A:

India: To be announced

Bangladesh: Nazmul Hossain Shanto (c), Soumya Sarkar, Tanzid Hasan, Tawhid Hridoy, Mushfiqur Rahim, MD Mahmud Ullah, Jaker Ali Anik, Mehidy Hasan Miraz, Rishad Hossain, Taskin Ahmed, Mustafizur Rahman, Parvez Hossai Emon, Nasum Ahmed, Tanzim Hasan Sakib, Nahid Rana

New Zealand: Mitchell Santner (c), Michael Bracewell, Mark Chapman, Devon Conway, Lockie Ferguson, Matt Henry, Tom Latham, Daryl Mitchell, Will O’Rourke, Glenn Phillips, Rachin Ravindra, Ben Sears, Nathan Smith, Kane Williamson, Will Young

Pakistan: To be announced

Group B:

Afghanistan: Hashmatullah Shahidi (c), Ibrahim Zadran, Rahmanullah Gurbaz, Sediqullah Atal, Rahmat Shah, Ikram Alikhil, Gulbadin Naib, Azmatullah Omarzai, Mohammad Nabi, Rashid Khan, AM Ghazanfar, Noor Ahmad, Fazalhaq Farooqi, Farid Malik, Naveed Zadran

England: Jos Buttler (c), Jofra Archer, Gus Atkinson, Jacob Bethell, Harry Brook, Brydon Carse, Ben Duckett, Jamie Overton, Jamie Smith, Liam Livingstone, Adil Rashid, Joe Root, Saqib Mahmood, Phil Salt, Mark Wood

Australia: To be announced

South Africa: To be announced

item.title: Given Bumrah’s fitness record, selection committee might not think of him as long-term Test captain - ThePrint
item.description:
Bumrah's Fitness Concerns Challenge His Captaincy Prospects

Date: January 12, 2024, Source: PTI

Jasprit Bumrah, seen as a frontrunner to replace Rohit Sharma as India's Test captain, faces doubts about his long-term captaincy potential due to ongoing fitness issues, including a recent back spasm.

  • Bumrah has been named as a potential replacement for Test captain Rohit Sharma.
  • Concerns about his fitness have arisen, particularly regarding his ability to lead in the long term.
  • Rishabh Pant and Yashasvi Jaiswal are considered for the vice-captain role.
  • Selector Ajit Agarkar indicates the need for a reliable deputy in case of injuries.
  • Bumrah led India in recent matches but struggles with fitness might affect future selections.
“For me, it is a very simple thing. You look at the data and find who is a sure-shot pick in Test cricket.” - Devang Gandhi

The selectors may need to consider alternative leadership options if Bumrah's injury issues persist, suggesting the importance of a strong vice-captain as he balances workload across formats.

item.title: IND-W vs IRE-W: Jemimah Rodrigues’ maiden ODI hundred powers India women to reach 370-run mark for 1st time in 47 years - Mint
item.description:
IND-W vs IRE-W: Jemimah Rodrigues’ maiden ODI hundred powers India women to reach 370-run mark for 1st time in 47 years

Publication Date: Unknown, Source: Live Mint

Jemimah Rodrigues scored her maiden ODI hundred, helping the India women's cricket team reach a historic total of 370 runs against Ireland, the highest in their ODI history.

  • India posted 370/5 in 50 overs during the second ODI against Ireland.
  • Captain Smriti Mandhana scored 73 runs, while Jemimah Rodrigues made 102 runs off 91 balls.
  • Other notable contributions included 67 runs from newcomer Pratika Rawal and 89 from Harleen Deol.
  • India's previous highest total in ODIs was 358/2, recorded against Ireland in 2017.
  • The innings featured 44 boundaries and three sixes, demonstrating the team's aggressive batting approach.
  • This match marks India's first ODI played since 1978.
“It was an overwhelming moment for me, and I am grateful for the support I received from my teammates.” - Jemimah Rodrigues

India leads the series 1-0 after winning their opening ODI by six wickets.

item.title: Real Madrid vs Barcelona Live Streaming Spanish Super Cup Final: When and where to watch El Clasico live online - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Real Madrid vs Barcelona Live Streaming Spanish Super Cup Final: When and Where to Watch El Clasico Live Online

Date: Jan 12, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

The stage is set for another El Clasico as Real Madrid faces FC Barcelona in the Spanish Super Cup Final, taking place at King Abdullah Sports City in Jeddah. Madrid aims for redemption following a recent loss to Barcelona.

  • The match will be played on January 13, 2025, at 12:30 AM IST.
  • The game will not be televised in India but can be streamed on the Fancode app and website.
  • Barcelona recently defeated Real Madrid 4-0 in their earlier encounter this season.
  • Madrid's Jude Bellingham is a standout player to watch in this crucial match.
“A clasico is a clasico and the pressure is even greater in a final.” - Carlo Ancelotti

This match promises to be a high-stakes competition between two of football's greatest rivals, as they both look to claim the prestigious trophy.

item.title: Litton and Shakib left out of Bangladesh's Champions Trophy squad - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
Litton Das and Shakib Al Hasan Excluded from Bangladesh's Champions Trophy Squad

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: ESPNcricinfo

Bangladesh has decided to leave wicketkeeper-batter Litton Das out of their squad for the upcoming Champions Trophy tournament, marking a significant decision following his recent poor performance in ODIs. Shakib Al Hasan is also not included due to suspension from bowling.

  • Litton Das has not scored a half-century in his last 13 ODI innings.
  • Shakib's exclusion is tied to his suspension due to an illegal bowling action.
  • Other players omitted from the squad include Afif Hossain, Shoriful Islam, and Hasan Mahmud.
  • Captain Najmul Hossain Shanto returns to the squad after recovering from a hamstring injury.
“Litton is out of form. He is getting out in a similar pattern... Opposition analysts are getting too successful against Litton,” said Gazi Ashraf Hossain, chief selector.

Bangladesh aims to rely on in-form players to seize opportunities during the tournament.
